resources.desc: Planet Minecraft is a family friendly community that shares and respects the creative works and interests of others.

resources.desc: Have you ever wanted to make your own Minecraft cheats? This is definitely the tutorial for you, because I'm going deeper than any other tutorial out there to teach you the core concepts of a client.

resources.title: Lodestone
resources.desc: Lodestone is a free, open source server hosting tool for Minecraft and other multiplayer games. It provides an intuitive and collaborative remote server and resource management experience for gamers.

resources.title: TechnoVision
resources.desc: Welcome to TechnoVision! My name is Thomas Peters, and I create a variety of tutorial and documentary content revolving around technology and computer programming!

resources.title: MCreator
resources.desc: MCreator is open source software used to make Minecraft Java Edition mods, Bedrock Edition Add-Ons, and data packs using an intuitive easy-to-learn interface or with an integrated code editor.
